metadata.title: CVE-2022-4906 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Blink in Google Chrome prior to108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker to perform arbitrary read/write viaa crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
